docs.text: Introduction Servers is a open source project, developed for the ease of developers. Handling microservices is messy work and it becomes more pain in the ass when you have to manage more than one at a time on a local machine. With servers, you can add multi servers and manage them all at a time without hustle. All you need to do is, get started

docs.text: Commands Below are all the available commands. list To list all the available commands sh run list servers To run all the added service in the system all at ones. sh run servers check To check the running servers status sh run check kill To kill all the running servers sh run kill service service have all the commands related to service starting with list To get the list of all the added services ah run service list add To add a new service to system sh run service add remove To remove a service (service name is required) sh run service remove <service_name> start To run the server for a particular service (service name is required) sh run service start <service_name>
